Version 1.1
- Added an option to view blocked content placeholders.
- Display a notification with the count of blocked elements.
- Improved performance and reduced memory usage.
- Bug fixes and stability improvements.


Content Blocker - Filter Out Unwanted Information Easily

Are you tired of seeing certain topics, words, or phrases on your web pages? Content Blocker is a simple yet powerful Chrome extension that helps you stay focused by hiding content containing specific keywords. Just enter the keywords you want to block, and Content Blocker will automatically remove any text, links, or news articles matching your preferences across all websites.

Features:
Customizable Keywords: Add or edit keywords anytime through the extension settings.
Efficient Content Filtering: Blocks text, links, or news articles that contain specified keywords.
User-Friendly Setup: Simple, intuitive interface to manage and update your keyword list.
Seamless Browsing: Enjoy a cleaner, distraction-free online experience tailored to your preferences.
With Content Blocker, you control what you see online. Install now to filter out the noise and focus on what matters!
